Detailed Description

High Throughput Streaming for ACQ196.

Revision:
1.11
  • File HTSTREAM.README main htstream readme
  • File setup.htstream.multi initialisation for one or more ACQ196 cards
  • File setup.htstream.acq164 initialisation for one or more ACQ164 cards
  • "User Interface" is via environment variables.
